siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
blogPost.body: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
blogPost.title: RelaxTax - Simplified tax returns for Austria
blogPost.author: Chris Eberl

localize.description: RelaxTax是奥地利的第一个应用程序，能够创建自动报税，并以电子方式提交和跟进奥地利税务机关（FinanzOnline）。它有多种语言版本，目前是德语和英语，以后还会有更多语言版本。
RelaxTax是奧地利的第一個應用程序，能夠創建自動報稅，並以電子方式提交和跟進奧地利稅務機關（FinanzOnline）。它有多種語言版本，目前是德語和英語，以後還會有更多語言版本。

previous.excerpt: MyBee App is a platform to connect skilled trades with clients in real-time. We also help small businesses generate more revenue fast by analyzing growth strategies using the power of AI.
previous.title: MyBee App - Connecting skilled-trades with clients in real time

localize.description: MyBee App是一个实时连接熟练交易与客户的平台。我们还通过利用人工智能的力量分析发展战略，帮助小企业快速创造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 将熟练的交易与客户实时连接起来。

localize.description: MyBee App是一個實時連接熟練交易與客戶的平臺。我們還通過利用人工智能的力量分析發展戰略，幫助小企業快速創造更多的收入。
localize.tagline: 將熟練的交易與客戶實時連接起來。

next.excerpt: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
next.title: Yogile - Photo storage simplified

localize.description: Yogile是一款时尚的照片管理应用，它可以让你存储无限数量的照片，而不用担心手机或电脑的存储空间不够用。
Yogile是一款時尚的照片管理應用，它可以讓你存儲無限數量的照片，而不用擔心手機或電腦的存儲空間不夠用。
